message: like next to mentions and stuff.
the natives are getting restless... looking forward to seeing direct messages fleshed-out here too
@i direct messages aren't officially release is was an accident that it was released ie https://convore.com/feedback/we-have-private-messages-just-discover-it-thank-you-convore-homerun-again/613898/
Yeah, trust me guys, there will be good integration, and API and stuff, the release was a mistake :)
Cool system. When will it officially launch,  I say now so you can work the bugs out on the fly while in use.
adds a little ambiguity to an otherwise wonderful api

great stuff adding private messages. but i think it's confusing that both direct-messages and standard-messages share the same api starting point at api/messages. i.e. "messages/:message_id/delete.json" vs "messages/message/:message_id/delete.json"

If you are viewing a group chat topic, private messages you get will show up there and you will have no way of knowing whether they are private or group chat messages. This problem exists in chromium / chrome at least.
